name: Product
description: Contains the key product attributes, including name, description, brand, codes, category, business group, and price.

fields.name: id
fields.description:
All products are assumed to be discrete and in eaches; cases (and later cartons, pallets etc) are converted 
Referred by other objects as 'product_id' unless explicitly stated

fields.name: connection_id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the data source (i.e. connection). Auto populated by Galaxy.

fields.name: product_type
fields.description:
Type of product. E.g. 'Finished Good', 'Component', 'Service', 'Packaging'
Can be user-defined

fields.name: thumbnail_url
fields.description: URL for product image

fields.name: is_deleted
fields.description: This is a Boolean value represented by 'N' or 'Y'. 'N' is active products

fields.name: creation_date
fields.description: Date when product was launched or released

fields.name: parent_product_id
fields.description: If the product is part of a bundle, and links to a parent product, then list the parent id. Note that bundles are separate from product/product groups

fields.name: display_desc
fields.description: External facing description of product

fields.name: discontinue_day
fields.description: Date when product was discontinued or is planned to be discontinued

fields.name: base_uom
fields.description: Default value is Eaches. Non-discrete products (e.g. powders, metals) can use other values.

fields.name: unit_cost
fields.description: Average unit cost of product. Measured in currency_uom per base_uom

fields.name: unit_price
fields.description: Unit Price or standard price or MSRP of product. Note that in future, this may be extended as Price can vary based on marketplace, time-of-sale.

fields.name: inventory_holding_cost
fields.description: Average yearly holding cost of product. Measured in currency_uom per base_uom

fields.name: currency_uom
fields.description: UOM for MSRP.

fields.name: product_available_day
fields.description: Date when product was available to be fulfilled. Can be after product was created

fields.name: shipping_weight
fields.description: Default weight to be used by carrier

fields.name: shipping_dimension
fields.description: Dimensional weight to be used by carrier. It is also derived from package length, width and height

fields.name: pkg_length
fields.description: Packaged length of individual product

fields.name: pkg_width
fields.description: Packaged width

fields.name: pkg_height
fields.description: Packaged height

fields.name: weight_uom
fields.description: Weight unit of measure

fields.name: dim_uom
fields.description: Dimension unit of measure

fields.name: diameter
fields.description: Diameter of individual product

fields.name: color
fields.description: Product color

fields.name: casepack_size
fields.description: If product has casepack, then how many products in each case pack. We will need to extend object to add casepack dimensions

fields.name: gtin
fields.description: Global Trade Item Number (GTIN) is a 14-digit number which includes various EAN/UCC numbering structures and is used to uniquely identify a product

fields.name: db_creation_dttm
fields.description: Internal audit field - stores when the record was created

fields.name: db_updation_dttm
fields.description: Internal audit field - stores when the record was last updated

fields.name: sap_0material_attr__prdha
fields.description: Product hierarchy. Predicate key for SAP mapping. Upsert key for  T179

fields.name: long_term_horizon
fields.description: Long Term Horizon time window used to determine salvage value

fields.name: long_term_horizon_uom
fields.description: UOM for Long Term Horizon time window used to determine salvage value

fields.name: salvage_value_percentage
fields.description: Product cost that we can expect to recover at end of Long Term Horizon
